recipe.title: Masala Omlette

ingredient.name: green bell pepper, sliced in rings

preparation.step: Heat oil in a frying pan to 104 degrees F (40 degrees C).
Crack open eggs in a bowl
Add sliced onion, green bell pepper, capcicum and vegetable masala in the bowl
Stir contents of the bowl for 30 seconds
Add the mixture in the bowl to the frying pan
Heat the frying pan for 2 minutes and flig the content in it
Again heat the frying pan for 2 minutes

recipe.comment: Make sure the contents are stirred properly for better taste.
